alert.note: Alert for Lackawanna; Luzerne; Southern Wayne; Wyoming (Pennsylvania) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Binghamton (South Central New York and Northeastern Pennsylvania)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued August 08 at 5:48PM EDT by NWS Binghamton
info.description: ...Strong thunderstorms will impact portions of Lackawanna, southwestern Wayne, Luzerne and southern Wyoming Counties through 645 PM EDT... At 548 PM EDT, Doppler radar was tracking strong thunderstorms along a line extending from 6 miles south of Kasson Brook to Buckhorn. Movement was east at 30 mph. HAZARD...Wind gusts up to 40 mph. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Locations impacted include... Scranton, Wilkes-Barre, Falls, Hazleton, Muhlenberg, Dunmore, Kingston, Berwick, Nanticoke and Plains. This includes the following highway exits... Interstate 80 between 256 and 273. Pennsylvania Interstate 81 between 143 and 194. Interstate 84 between 1 and 4. Interstate 380 between 20 and 24. Interstate 476 between 105 and 131. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. Heavy rainfall is also occurring with these storms and may lead to localized flooding. Do not drive your vehicle through flooded roadways. These storms may intensify, so be certain to monitor local radio stations and available television stations for additional information and possible warnings from the National Weather Service.
